alert.note: Alert for East Bay Hills; East Bay Interior Valleys; San Francisco Bay Shoreline; San Fransisco Peninsula Coast (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 27 at 3:22PM PST by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Alameda, central San Mateo and northwestern Santa Clara Counties through 415 PM PST... At 321 PM PST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Woodside, or near San Carlos, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... San Jose, Fremont, Hayward, Sunnyvale, Santa Clara, San Mateo, Livermore, Redwood City, Mountain View, Pleasanton, Union City, Milpitas, Palo Alto, Cupertino, Dublin, Newark, Menlo Park, Foster City, Los Altos and Burlingame. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: East Bay Hills; East Bay Interior Valleys; San Francisco Bay Shoreline; San Fransisco Peninsula Coast
